arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic 'in a false position' near bottom of League One, insists Wycombe Wanderers boss
arts.sum: Wycombe Wanderers manager Matt Bloomfield feels Wigan Athletic are in a false position just outside the League One drop-zone after admitting his table-topping side were fortunate to pick up all three points at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss satisfied with Wycombe Wanderers display - 'apart from the most important part'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney acknowledged Wigan Athletic's performance in defeat against League One leaders Wycombe Wanderers was almost complete - 'apart from the most important part'.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Wigan Athletic 0 Wycombe Wanderers 1 - Second-half onslaught from Tics not enough to secure a point
arts.sum: A rousing second-half effort from Wigan Athletic proved to be in vain as League One leaders Wycombe Wanderers held on for a 1-0 victory at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Early goal sees leaders Wycombe to win over Wigan
arts.sum: Joe Low scored the only goal in the 11th minute.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Four changes in our expected team v Wycombe Wanderers
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Wycombe Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief sets out Wycombe Wanderers challenge - 'We'll go for them'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney says Wigan Athletic will 'go for' League One leaders Wycombe Wanderers this weekend - and 'let's see if we can play through them'.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic set to confirm swoop for ex-Premier League and international defender
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic are poised to complete the capture of former Newcastle United and Wales international defender Paul Dummett - and he's ready to make an immediate impact.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic to sign 33-year-old after Portsmouth, Sheffield United transfer talks
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic are set to sign former Newcastle United defender Paul Dummett, according to a report from Chronicle… The post Wigan Athletic to sign 33-year-old after Portsmouth, Sheffield United transfer talks appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chairman on plans for Brick Community Stadium ownership switch
arts.sum: Ben Goodburn says plans which would see the Brick Community Stadium become its own separate entity alongside Wigan Athletic and Wigan Warriors under the Mike Danson umbrella will help to 'safeguard' the 'long-term future of both clubs'.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - 'It's time to believe again and come out fighting...'
arts.sum: Our panel of Latics experts run the rule over a successful FA Cup round-one trip to Carlisle, ahead of this weekend’s visit of League One leaders Wycombe Wanderers...with off-field matters to discuss as well...
